content: Lantana is seeking a full time Software Engineer who will help develop software in focused on FHIR technologies. Ideally, the candidate will have experience with both Java and JavaScript technology stacks. The position is 100% work-from-home. For more information, go to http://www.lantanagroup.com/careers/software-engineer-full-time/. If interested, please send your resume to careers@lantanagroup.com
